headline: Moleaer Partners with Xylem to Globally Scale Nanobubble Technology for Water Treatment
summary: In a move that affirms the next wave of innovation in water treatment, Moleaer, the pioneer and market leader in nanobubble technology, is partnering with Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL) to scale its patented technology for municipal and industrial wastewater treatment plants worldwide. The partnership includes a global distribution agreement and a strategic investment in Moleaer.
